title: Starship Destroyer
description: In this project you get points for destroying the spaceships that appear on the screen. The aim is to get as many points as possible in 30 seconds!

steps.title: Create a flying spaceship
steps.description: Use a forever loop to make the spaceship fly from side to side forever

components.text: Open the **Scratch Starter Project**
Make the spaceship move forever forward

components.blocks:
when FLAG clicked
forever
move (10) steps
end

components.text: Make the spaceship show and hide, adding to this:
components.blocks:
when FLAG clicked 
 forever 
 hide

 end

components.text: If you haven't already, slow it down so you can see. Try use:

	forever

	 show

steps.title: Explode the spaceship when clicked
steps.description: We also want to add a score each time you do!

components.text: Change the spaceship costume to the explosion costume when it's clicked
Make the exploded spaceship hide really quickly

components.blocks:
when this sprite clicked 
 switch costume to [explode v] 
 wait (0.1) secs 
 hide

components.text: Change back to the starship once hidden. Try:
Make sure you get a point for destroying it. Creating a new 'global' variable 'score'

steps.title: Create the game starting point
steps.description: Adding a timer, and resetting the score

components.text: switch to the **Stage** and create a new variable called **time_left**
Start the game by giving **time_left** and **score** initial values
components.blocks:
when FLAG clicked 
 set [time-left v] to (30) 
 set [score v] to (0)

components.text: Create a counter, by reducing the time every second

components.blocks:
repeat until ((time_left)=(0)) 
 wait (1) secs 
 change [time_left v] by (-1)

components.text: clice the green flag to see if the countdown works

steps.title: Gameover
steps.description: End the game, telling the player what their score is

components.text: Go to the **stage** scripts, and add this to tell all sprites the game is over
Go into each sprite and tell them to hide when the game is over
components.blocks:
when I recieve [game_over v] :: events hat 
 hide 
 stop [all v]

components.text: Create a new sprite to say the score. Have the sprite initially hidden.
components.blocks:
when FLAG clicked 
 hide 

 when I recieve [game_over v] :: events hat 
 show 
 say (join[Well done, your score is](score))
